title: Fire Fighting Hand Tool
summary: An ergonomic, high-pressure nozzle designed for effective fire suppression and user control.
description: This project involved the complete mechanical design of a fire fighting hand tool. The model focuses on an ergonomic grip for user comfort and a robust assembly for reliability under high-pressure conditions. Designed in SolidWorks for manufacturing.

title: Immersive VR Headset
summary: A sleek, modern VR headset concept with a focus on aesthetics and user comfort.
description: This industrial design project showcases advanced surface modeling for a VR headset. The design prioritizes a minimalist aesthetic and an ergonomic fit, with a smooth, continuous visor and a comfortable strap system.

title: Luxury Perfume Bottle
summary: An elegant and artistic perfume bottle design with a unique flame-inspired cap.
description: A product design concept for a luxury perfume line. The model features a minimalist glass body contrasted with a sculpted, organic cap, created using advanced surfacing techniques in SolidWorks to achieve a premium look and feel.

title: Pleated Decorative Pot
summary: A modern decorative pot featuring a complex pleated texture, designed for 3D printing.
description: This design explores complex geometry and patterns for home decor. The pleated texture was meticulously modeled in SolidWorks, creating a visually striking piece that is optimized for fabrication technologies like 3D printing or molding.

title: Raspberry Pi Camera Enclosure
summary: A compact and functional enclosure designed to house and protect a Raspberry Pi camera module.
description: This is a custom-designed enclosure for a Raspberry Pi camera. It includes precise cutouts for the lens and mounting points, ensuring a secure fit. The design balances protection with a minimal footprint, ideal for DIY electronics and prototyping.

title: Raspberry Pi Display Enclosure
summary: A protective enclosure for a Raspberry Pi display, featuring ventilation and port access.
description: Engineered to fit a Raspberry Pi and its touchscreen display, this enclosure provides robust protection while maintaining access to all necessary ports. The design includes honeycomb ventilation patterns for optimal thermal performance.

title: Ventilated Server Rack Enclosure
summary: A sheet metal server rack designed for data center equipment with a focus on ventilation.
description: This project is a design for a standard server rack enclosure using sheet metal principles. It features ventilated side panels with a wood-accent aesthetic and a top-mounted fan cutout for superior thermal management, combining functionality with modern design.

title: Adjustable Articulating Tray
summary: A versatile, multi-joint articulating arm with a mounting tray for devices or tools.
description: This mechanical assembly features a fully adjustable articulating arm designed for maximum flexibility and positioning. The exploded view showcases every component, including screws and covers, demonstrating a thorough understanding of mechanical assemblies and technical documentation.

title: Fantasy Football Championship Trophy
summary: A custom-designed championship trophy for a fantasy football league.
description: A bespoke trophy design created to celebrate a fantasy football victory. The model features a prominent football topper, a sleek black base with engraved text, and a modern aesthetic, designed to be a premium award.
